reviewText: Story of obessive love, physical sexual one by male character, and abusive love with female character. Not much of a story - no character development. One wonders why female character was obsessed with abusive boyfriend, and becomes sex toy for the aloof main male character. Terrible ending.
Oh Ji-Ho is super hot in this film.  Super sexually intense...It tells the story of a one sided love and the slave one becomes to preserve it.  Great Film!!!!!!!!

Not only did this film not impress me (on an artistic level) but it also failed to deliver anyplace else either (on a pornographic level).

I mean, if it's not gonna be worth watching for the storyline, at least be worth the while in sex scenes.  This crap was ridiculous.  The subtitles were off.  The acting was terrible.  Nothing to see here.  Keep moving and save your money.
